nested.name: jsx3.xml.Cacheable
nested.text: A mixin interface that provides the following capabilities to implementing classes:

nested.name: jsx3.xml.CDF
nested.text: Mixin interface that provides methods for accessing and manipulating an XML document in CDF schema.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.DojoDataStore
nested.text: Provides access to Dojo data store through the CDF interface.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.Processor
nested.text: Wrapper of the native browser XSLT processor.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.Document
nested.text: Wrapper of the native browser XML document class.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.Entity
nested.text: Wrapper of the native browser XML node class.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.Template
nested.text: Wrapper of the native browser XSLT processor.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.XslDocument
nested.text: An extension of jsx3.xml.Document that encapsulates a compiled XSL template.

nested.name: jsx3.xml.CDF.Document
nested.text: A subclass of jsx3.xml.Document that implements the CDF interface.
